Samples: Remote Streaming

This example mainly demonstrates how to stream media file to remote peer using RTP.

This file is pjsip-apps/src/samples/streamutil.c

00001 /* $Id: streamutil.c 3816 2011-10-14 04:15:15Z bennylp $ */
00002 /*

00033 #include <pjlib.h>
00034 #include <pjlib-util.h>
00035 #include <pjmedia.h>
00036 #include <pjmedia-codec.h>
00037 #include <pjmedia/transport_srtp.h>
00038 
00039 #include <stdlib.h>     /* atoi() */
00040 #include <stdio.h>
00041 
00042 #include "util.h"
00043 
00044 
00045 static const char *desc = 
00046  " streamutil                                                           \n"
00047  "                                                                      \n"
00048  " PURPOSE:                                                             \n"
00049  "  Demonstrate how to use pjmedia stream component to transmit/receive \n"
00050  "  RTP packets to/from sound device.                                   \n"
00051  "\n"
00052  "\n"
00053  " USAGE:                                                               \n"
00054  "  streamutil [options]                                                \n"
00055  "\n"
00056  "\n"
00057  " Options:\n"
00058  "  --codec=CODEC         Set the codec name.                           \n"
00059  "  --local-port=PORT     Set local RTP port (default=4000)             \n"
00060  "  --remote=IP:PORT      Set the remote peer. If this option is set,   \n"
00061  "                        the program will transmit RTP audio to the    \n"
00062  "                        specified address. (default: recv only)       \n"
00063  "  --play-file=WAV       Send audio from the WAV file instead of from  \n"
00064  "                        the sound device.                             \n"
00065  "  --record-file=WAV     Record incoming audio to WAV file instead of  \n"
00066  "                        playing it to sound device.                   \n"
00067  "  --send-recv           Set stream direction to bidirectional.        \n"
00068  "  --send-only           Set stream direction to send only             \n"
00069  "  --recv-only           Set stream direction to recv only (default)   \n"
00070 
00071 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00072  "  --use-srtp[=NAME]     Enable SRTP with crypto suite NAME            \n"
00073  "                        e.g: AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_80 (default),       \n"
00074  "                             AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_32                  \n"
00075  "                        Use this option along with the TX & RX keys,  \n"
00076  "                        formated of 60 hex digits (e.g: E148DA..)      \n"
00077  "  --srtp-tx-key         SRTP key for transmiting                      \n"
00078  "  --srtp-rx-key         SRTP key for receiving                        \n"
00079 #endif
00080 
00081  "\n"
00082 ;
00083 
00084

00086 
00087 #define THIS_FILE       "stream.c"
00088

00090 
00091 /* Prototype */
00092 static void print_stream_stat(pjmedia_stream *stream, 
00093                               const pjmedia_codec_param *codec_param);
00094 
00095 /* Prototype for LIBSRTP utility in file datatypes.c */
00096 int hex_string_to_octet_string(char *raw, char *hex, int len);
00097 
00098 /* 
00099  * Register all codecs. 
00100  */
00101 static pj_status_t init_codecs(pjmedia_endpt *med_endpt)
00102 {
00103     pj_status_t status;
00104 
00105     /* To suppress warning about unused var when all codecs are disabled */
00106     PJ_UNUSED_ARG(status);
00107 
00108 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_G711_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_G711_CODEC!=0
00109     status = pjmedia_codec_g711_init(med_endpt);
00110     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_GSM_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_GSM_CODEC!=0
00114     status = pjmedia_codec_gsm_init(med_endpt);
00115     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SPEEX_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_SPEEX_CODEC!=0
00119     status = pjmedia_codec_speex_init(med_endpt, 0, -1, -1);
00120     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00121 #endif
00122 
00123 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_G722_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_G722_CODEC!=0
00124     status = pjmedia_codec_g722_init(med_endpt);
00125     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENCORE_AMRNB_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_OPENCORE_AMRNB_CODEC!=0
00129     status = pjmedia_codec_opencore_amrnb_init(med_endpt);
00130     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00131 #endif
00132 
00133 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_L16_CODEC) && PJMEDIA_HAS_L16_CODEC!=0
00134     status = pjmedia_codec_l16_init(med_endpt, 0);
00135     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, status);
00136 #endif
00137 
00138     return PJ_SUCCESS;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 /* 
00143  * Create stream based on the codec, dir, remote address, etc. 
00144  */
00145 static pj_status_t create_stream( pj_pool_t *pool,
00146                                   pjmedia_endpt *med_endpt,
00147                                   const pjmedia_codec_info *codec_info,
00148                                   pjmedia_dir dir,
00149                                   pj_uint16_t local_port,
00150                                   const pj_sockaddr_in *rem_addr,
00151 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00152                                   pj_bool_t use_srtp,
00153                                   const pj_str_t *crypto_suite,
00154                                   const pj_str_t *srtp_tx_key,
00155                                   const pj_str_t *srtp_rx_key,
00156 #endif
00157                                   pjmedia_stream **p_stream )
00158 {
00159     pjmedia_stream_info info;
00160     pjmedia_transport *transport = NULL;
00161     pj_status_t status;
00162 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00163     pjmedia_transport *srtp_tp = NULL;
00164 #endif
00165 
00166 
00167     /* Reset stream info. */
00168     pj_bzero(&info, sizeof(info));
00169 
00170 
00171     /* Initialize stream info formats */
00172     info.type = PJMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO;
00173     info.dir = dir;
00174     pj_memcpy(&info.fmt, codec_info, sizeof(pjmedia_codec_info));
00175     info.tx_pt = codec_info->pt;
00176     info.ssrc = pj_rand();
00177     
00178 #if PJMEDIA_HAS_RTCP_XR && PJMEDIA_STREAM_ENABLE_XR
00179     /* Set default RTCP XR enabled/disabled */
00180     info.rtcp_xr_enabled = PJ_TRUE;
00181 #endif
00182 
00183     /* Copy remote address */
00184     pj_memcpy(&info.rem_addr, rem_addr, sizeof(pj_sockaddr_in));
00185 
00186     /* If remote address is not set, set to an arbitrary address
00187      * (otherwise stream will assert).
00188      */
00189     if (info.rem_addr.addr.sa_family == 0) {
00190         const pj_str_t addr = pj_str("127.0.0.1");
00191         pj_sockaddr_in_init(&info.rem_addr.ipv4, &addr, 0);
00192     }
00193 
00194     /* Create media transport */
00195     status = pjmedia_transport_udp_create(med_endpt, NULL, local_port,
00196                                           0, &transport);
00197     if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
00198         return status;
00199 
00200 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00201     /* Check if SRTP enabled */
00202     if (use_srtp) {
00203         pjmedia_srtp_crypto tx_plc, rx_plc;
00204 
00205         status = pjmedia_transport_srtp_create(med_endpt, transport, 
00206                                                NULL, &srtp_tp);
00207         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
00208             return status;
00209 
00210         pj_bzero(&tx_plc, sizeof(pjmedia_srtp_crypto));
00211         pj_bzero(&rx_plc, sizeof(pjmedia_srtp_crypto));
00212 
00213         tx_plc.key = *srtp_tx_key;
00214         tx_plc.name = *crypto_suite;
00215         rx_plc.key = *srtp_rx_key;
00216         rx_plc.name = *crypto_suite;
00217         
00218         status = pjmedia_transport_srtp_start(srtp_tp, &tx_plc, &rx_plc);
00219         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
00220             return status;
00221 
00222         transport = srtp_tp;
00223     }
00224 #endif
00225 
00226     /* Now that the stream info is initialized, we can create the 
00227      * stream.
00228      */
00229 
00230     status = pjmedia_stream_create( med_endpt, pool, &info, 
00231                                     transport, 
00232                                     NULL, p_stream);
00233 
00234     if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00235         app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Error creating stream", status);
00236         pjmedia_transport_close(transport);
00237         return status;
00238     }
00239 
00240 
00241     return PJ_SUCCESS;
00242 }
00243 
00244 
00245 /*
00246  * usage()
00247  */
00248 static void usage()
00249 {
00250     puts(desc);
00251 }
00252 
00253 /*
00254  * main()
00255  */
00256 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00257 {
00258     pj_caching_pool cp;
00259     pjmedia_endpt *med_endpt;
00260     pj_pool_t *pool;
00261     pjmedia_port *rec_file_port = NULL, *play_file_port = NULL;
00262     pjmedia_master_port *master_port = NULL;
00263     pjmedia_snd_port *snd_port = NULL;
00264     pjmedia_stream *stream = NULL;
00265     pjmedia_port *stream_port;
00266     char tmp[10];
00267     pj_status_t status; 
00268 
00269 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00270     /* SRTP variables */
00271     pj_bool_t use_srtp = PJ_FALSE;
00272     char tmp_tx_key[64];
00273     char tmp_rx_key[64];
00274     pj_str_t  srtp_tx_key = {NULL, 0};
00275     pj_str_t  srtp_rx_key = {NULL, 0};
00276     pj_str_t  srtp_crypto_suite = {NULL, 0};
00277     int tmp_key_len;
00278 #endif
00279 
00280     /* Default values */
00281     const pjmedia_codec_info *codec_info;
00282     pjmedia_codec_param codec_param;
00283     pjmedia_dir dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_DECODING;
00284     pj_sockaddr_in remote_addr;
00285     pj_uint16_t local_port = 4000;
00286     char *codec_id = NULL;
00287     char *rec_file = NULL;
00288     char *play_file = NULL;
00289 
00290     enum {
00291         OPT_CODEC       = 'c',
00292         OPT_LOCAL_PORT  = 'p',
00293         OPT_REMOTE      = 'r',
00294         OPT_PLAY_FILE   = 'w',
00295         OPT_RECORD_FILE = 'R',
00296         OPT_SEND_RECV   = 'b',
00297         OPT_SEND_ONLY   = 's',
00298         OPT_RECV_ONLY   = 'i',
00299 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00300         OPT_USE_SRTP    = 'S',
00301 #endif
00302         OPT_SRTP_TX_KEY = 'x',
00303         OPT_SRTP_RX_KEY = 'y',
00304         OPT_HELP        = 'h',
00305     };
00306 
00307     struct pj_getopt_option long_options[] = {
00308         { "codec",          1, 0, OPT_CODEC },
00309         { "local-port",     1, 0, OPT_LOCAL_PORT },
00310         { "remote",         1, 0, OPT_REMOTE },
00311         { "play-file",      1, 0, OPT_PLAY_FILE },
00312         { "record-file",    1, 0, OPT_RECORD_FILE },
00313         { "send-recv",      0, 0, OPT_SEND_RECV },
00314         { "send-only",      0, 0, OPT_SEND_ONLY },
00315         { "recv-only",      0, 0, OPT_RECV_ONLY },
00316 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00317         { "use-srtp",       2, 0, OPT_USE_SRTP },
00318         { "srtp-tx-key",    1, 0, OPT_SRTP_TX_KEY },
00319         { "srtp-rx-key",    1, 0, OPT_SRTP_RX_KEY },
00320 #endif
00321         { "help",           0, 0, OPT_HELP },
00322         { NULL, 0, 0, 0 },
00323     };
00324 
00325     int c;
00326     int option_index;
00327 
00328 
00329     pj_bzero(&remote_addr, sizeof(remote_addr));
00330 
00331 
00332     /* init PJLIB : */
00333     status = pj_init();
00334     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00335 
00336 
00337     /* Parse arguments */
00338     pj_optind = 0;
00339     while((c=pj_getopt_long(argc,argv, "h", long_options, &option_index))!=-1) {
00340 
00341         switch (c) {
00342         case OPT_CODEC:
00343             codec_id = pj_optarg;
00344             break;
00345 
00346         case OPT_LOCAL_PORT:
00347             local_port = (pj_uint16_t) atoi(pj_optarg);
00348             if (local_port < 1) {
00349                 printf("Error: invalid local port %s\n", pj_optarg);
00350                 return 1;
00351             }
00352             break;
00353 
00354         case OPT_REMOTE:
00355             {
00356                 pj_str_t ip = pj_str(strtok(pj_optarg, ":"));
00357                 pj_uint16_t port = (pj_uint16_t) atoi(strtok(NULL, ":"));
00358 
00359                 status = pj_sockaddr_in_init(&remote_addr, &ip, port);
00360                 if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00361                     app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Invalid remote address", status);
00362                     return 1;
00363                 }
00364             }
00365             break;
00366 
00367         case OPT_PLAY_FILE:
00368             play_file = pj_optarg;
00369             break;
00370 
00371         case OPT_RECORD_FILE:
00372             rec_file = pj_optarg;
00373             break;
00374 
00375         case OPT_SEND_RECV:
00376             dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING_DECODING;
00377             break;
00378 
00379         case OPT_SEND_ONLY:
00380             dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING;
00381             break;
00382 
00383         case OPT_RECV_ONLY:
00384             dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_DECODING;
00385             break;
00386 
00387 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00388         case OPT_USE_SRTP:
00389             use_srtp = PJ_TRUE;
00390             if (pj_optarg) {
00391                 pj_strset(&srtp_crypto_suite, pj_optarg, strlen(pj_optarg));
00392             } else {
00393                 srtp_crypto_suite = pj_str("AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_80");
00394             }
00395             break;
00396 
00397         case OPT_SRTP_TX_KEY:
00398             tmp_key_len = hex_string_to_octet_string(tmp_tx_key, pj_optarg, strlen(pj_optarg));
00399             pj_strset(&srtp_tx_key, tmp_tx_key, tmp_key_len/2);
00400             break;
00401 
00402         case OPT_SRTP_RX_KEY:
00403             tmp_key_len = hex_string_to_octet_string(tmp_rx_key, pj_optarg, strlen(pj_optarg));
00404             pj_strset(&srtp_rx_key, tmp_rx_key, tmp_key_len/2);
00405             break;
00406 #endif
00407 
00408         case OPT_HELP:
00409             usage();
00410             return 1;
00411 
00412         default:
00413             printf("Invalid options %s\n", argv[pj_optind]);
00414             return 1;
00415         }
00416 
00417     }
00418 
00419 
00420     /* Verify arguments. */
00421     if (dir & PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING) {
00422         if (remote_addr.sin_addr.s_addr == 0) {
00423             printf("Error: remote address must be set\n");
00424             return 1;
00425         }
00426     }
00427 
00428     if (play_file != NULL && dir != PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING) {
00429         printf("Direction is set to --send-only because of --play-file\n");
00430         dir = PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING;
00431     }
00432 
00433 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00434     /* SRTP validation */
00435     if (use_srtp) {
00436         if (!srtp_tx_key.slen || !srtp_rx_key.slen)
00437         {
00438             printf("Error: Key for each SRTP stream direction must be set\n");
00439             return 1;
00440         }
00441     }
00442 #endif
00443 
00444     /* Must create a pool factory before we can allocate any memory. */
00445     pj_caching_pool_init(&cp, &pj_pool_factory_default_policy, 0);
00446 
00447     /* 
00448      * Initialize media endpoint.
00449      * This will implicitly initialize PJMEDIA too.
00450      */
00451     status = pjmedia_endpt_create(&cp.factory, NULL, 1, &med_endpt);
00452     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00453 
00454     /* Create memory pool for application purpose */
00455     pool = pj_pool_create( &cp.factory,     /* pool factory         */
00456                            "app",           /* pool name.           */
00457                            4000,            /* init size            */
00458                            4000,            /* increment size       */
00459                            NULL             /* callback on error    */
00460                            );
00461 
00462 
00463     /* Register all supported codecs */
00464     status = init_codecs(med_endpt);
00465     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00466 
00467 
00468     /* Find which codec to use. */
00469     if (codec_id) {
00470         unsigned count = 1;
00471         pj_str_t str_codec_id = pj_str(codec_id);
00472         pjmedia_codec_mgr *codec_mgr = pjmedia_endpt_get_codec_mgr(med_endpt);
00473         status = pjmedia_codec_mgr_find_codecs_by_id( codec_mgr,
00474                                                       &str_codec_id, &count,
00475                                                       &codec_info, NULL);
00476         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00477             printf("Error: unable to find codec %s\n", codec_id);
00478             return 1;
00479         }
00480     } else {
00481         /* Default to pcmu */
00482         pjmedia_codec_mgr_get_codec_info( pjmedia_endpt_get_codec_mgr(med_endpt),
00483                                           0, &codec_info);
00484     }
00485 
00486     /* Create stream based on program arguments */
00487     status = create_stream(pool, med_endpt, codec_info, dir, local_port, 
00488                            &remote_addr, 
00489 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_SRTP != 0)
00490                            use_srtp, &srtp_crypto_suite, 
00491                            &srtp_tx_key, &srtp_rx_key,
00492 #endif
00493                            &stream);
00494     if (status != PJ_SUCCESS)
00495         goto on_exit;
00496 
00497     /* Get codec default param for info */
00498     status = pjmedia_codec_mgr_get_default_param(
00499                                     pjmedia_endpt_get_codec_mgr(med_endpt), 
00500                                     codec_info, 
00501                                     &codec_param);
00502     /* Should be ok, as create_stream() above succeeded */
00503     pj_assert(status == PJ_SUCCESS);
00504 
00505     /* Get the port interface of the stream */
00506     status = pjmedia_stream_get_port( stream, &stream_port);
00507     PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00508 
00509 
00510     if (play_file) {
00511         unsigned wav_ptime;
00512 
00513         wav_ptime = stream_port->info.samples_per_frame * 1000 /
00514                     stream_port->info.clock_rate;
00515         status = pjmedia_wav_player_port_create(pool, play_file, wav_ptime,
00516                                                 0, -1, &play_file_port);
00517         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00518             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to use file", status);
00519             goto on_exit;
00520         }
00521 
00522         status = pjmedia_master_port_create(pool, play_file_port, stream_port,
00523                                             0, &master_port);
00524         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00525             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to create master port", status);
00526             goto on_exit;
00527         }
00528 
00529         status = pjmedia_master_port_start(master_port);
00530         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00531             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Error starting master port", status);
00532             goto on_exit;
00533         }
00534 
00535         printf("Playing from WAV file %s..\n", play_file);
00536 
00537     } else if (rec_file) {
00538 
00539         status = pjmedia_wav_writer_port_create(pool, rec_file,
00540                                                 stream_port->info.clock_rate,
00541                                                 stream_port->info.channel_count,
00542                                                 stream_port->info.samples_per_frame,
00543                                                 stream_port->info.bits_per_sample,
00544                                                 0, 0, &rec_file_port);
00545         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00546             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to use file", status);
00547             goto on_exit;
00548         }
00549 
00550         status = pjmedia_master_port_create(pool, stream_port, rec_file_port, 
00551                                             0, &master_port);
00552         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00553             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to create master port", status);
00554             goto on_exit;
00555         }
00556 
00557         status = pjmedia_master_port_start(master_port);
00558         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00559             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Error starting master port", status);
00560             goto on_exit;
00561         }
00562 
00563         printf("Recording to WAV file %s..\n", rec_file);
00564         
00565     } else {
00566 
00567         /* Create sound device port. */
00568         if (dir == PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING_DECODING)
00569             status = pjmedia_snd_port_create(pool, -1, -1, 
00570                                         stream_port->info.clock_rate,
00571                                         stream_port->info.channel_count,
00572                                         stream_port->info.samples_per_frame,
00573                                         stream_port->info.bits_per_sample,
00574                                         0, &snd_port);
00575         else if (dir == PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING)
00576             status = pjmedia_snd_port_create_rec(pool, -1, 
00577                                         stream_port->info.clock_rate,
00578                                         stream_port->info.channel_count,
00579                                         stream_port->info.samples_per_frame,
00580                                         stream_port->info.bits_per_sample,
00581                                         0, &snd_port);
00582         else
00583             status = pjmedia_snd_port_create_player(pool, -1, 
00584                                         stream_port->info.clock_rate,
00585                                         stream_port->info.channel_count,
00586                                         stream_port->info.samples_per_frame,
00587                                         stream_port->info.bits_per_sample,
00588                                         0, &snd_port);
00589 
00590 
00591         if (status != PJ_SUCCESS) {
00592             app_perror(THIS_FILE, "Unable to create sound port", status);
00593             goto on_exit;
00594         }
00595 
00596         /* Connect sound port to stream */
00597         status = pjmedia_snd_port_connect( snd_port, stream_port );
00598         PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00599 
00600     }
00601 
00602     /* Start streaming */
00603     pjmedia_stream_start(stream);
00604 
00605 
00606     /* Done */
00607 
00608     if (dir == PJMEDIA_DIR_DECODING)
00609         printf("Stream is active, dir is recv-only, local port is %d\n",
00610                local_port);
00611     else if (dir == PJMEDIA_DIR_ENCODING)
00612         printf("Stream is active, dir is send-only, sending to %s:%d\n",
00613                pj_inet_ntoa(remote_addr.sin_addr),
00614                pj_ntohs(remote_addr.sin_port));
00615     else
00616         printf("Stream is active, send/recv, local port is %d, "
00617                "sending to %s:%d\n",
00618                local_port,
00619                pj_inet_ntoa(remote_addr.sin_addr),
00620                pj_ntohs(remote_addr.sin_port));
00621 
00622 
00623     for (;;) {
00624 
00625         puts("");
00626         puts("Commands:");
00627         puts("  s     Display media statistics");
00628         puts("  q     Quit");
00629         puts("");
00630 
00631         printf("Command: "); fflush(stdout);
00632 
00633         if (fgets(tmp, sizeof(tmp), stdin) == NULL) {
00634             puts("EOF while reading stdin, will quit now..");
00635             break;
00636         }
00637 
00638         if (tmp[0] == 's')
00639             print_stream_stat(stream, &codec_param);
00640         else if (tmp[0] == 'q')
00641             break;
00642 
00643     }
00644 
00645 
00646 
00647     /* Start deinitialization: */
00648 on_exit:
00649 
00650     /* Destroy sound device */
00651     if (snd_port) {
00652         pjmedia_snd_port_destroy( snd_port );
00653         PJ_ASSERT_RETURN(status == PJ_SUCCESS, 1);
00654     }
00655 
00656     /* If there is master port, then we just need to destroy master port
00657      * (it will recursively destroy upstream and downstream ports, which
00658      * in this case are file_port and stream_port).
00659      */
00660     if (master_port) {
00661         pjmedia_master_port_destroy(master_port, PJ_TRUE);
00662         play_file_port = NULL;
00663         stream = NULL;
00664     }
00665 
00666     /* Destroy stream */
00667     if (stream) {
00668         pjmedia_transport *tp;
00669 
00670         tp = pjmedia_stream_get_transport(stream);
00671         pjmedia_stream_destroy(stream);
00672         
00673         pjmedia_transport_close(tp);
00674     }
00675 
00676     /* Destroy file ports */
00677     if (play_file_port)
00678         pjmedia_port_destroy( play_file_port );
00679     if (rec_file_port)
00680         pjmedia_port_destroy( rec_file_port );
00681 
00682 
00683     /* Release application pool */
00684     pj_pool_release( pool );
00685 
00686     /* Destroy media endpoint. */
00687     pjmedia_endpt_destroy( med_endpt );
00688 
00689     /* Destroy pool factory */
00690     pj_caching_pool_destroy( &cp );
00691 
00692     /* Shutdown PJLIB */
00693     pj_shutdown();
00694 
00695 
00696     return (status == PJ_SUCCESS) ? 0 : 1;
00697 }
00698 
00699 
00700 
00701 
00702 static const char *good_number(char *buf, pj_int32_t val)
00703 {
00704     if (val < 1000) {
00705         pj_ansi_sprintf(buf, "%d", val);
00706     } else if (val < 1000000) {
00707         pj_ansi_sprintf(buf, "%d.%dK", 
00708                         val / 1000,
00709                         (val % 1000) / 100);
00710     } else {
00711         pj_ansi_sprintf(buf, "%d.%02dM", 
00712                         val / 1000000,
00713                         (val % 1000000) / 10000);
00714     }
00715 
00716     return buf;
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 #define SAMPLES_TO_USEC(usec, samples, clock_rate) \
00721     do { \
00722         if (samples <= 4294) \
00723             usec = samples * 1000000 / clock_rate; \
00724         else { \
00725             usec = samples * 1000 / clock_rate; \
00726             usec *= 1000; \
00727         } \
00728     } while(0)
00729 
00730 #define PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(s, v) \
00731     if (v == 127) \
00732         sprintf(s, "(na)"); \
00733     else \
00734         sprintf(s, "%d", v)
00735 
00736 
00737 /*
00738  * Print stream statistics
00739  */
00740 static void print_stream_stat(pjmedia_stream *stream,
00741                               const pjmedia_codec_param *codec_param)
00742 {
00743     char duration[80], last_update[80];
00744     char bps[16], ipbps[16], packets[16], bytes[16], ipbytes[16];
00745     pjmedia_port *port;
00746     pjmedia_rtcp_stat stat;
00747     pj_time_val now;
00748 
00749 
00750     pj_gettimeofday(&now);
00751     pjmedia_stream_get_stat(stream, &stat);
00752     pjmedia_stream_get_port(stream, &port);
00753 
00754     puts("Stream statistics:");
00755 
00756     /* Print duration */
00757     PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, stat.start);
00758     sprintf(duration, " Duration: %02ld:%02ld:%02ld.%03ld",
00759             now.sec / 3600,
00760             (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
00761             (now.sec % 60),
00762             now.msec);
00763 
00764 
00765     printf(" Info: audio %.*s@%dHz, %dms/frame, %sB/s (%sB/s +IP hdr)\n",
00766         (int)port->info.encoding_name.slen,
00767         port->info.encoding_name.ptr,
00768         port->info.clock_rate,
00769         port->info.samples_per_frame * 1000 / port->info.clock_rate,
00770         good_number(bps, (codec_param->info.avg_bps+7)/8),
00771         good_number(ipbps, ((codec_param->info.avg_bps+7)/8) + 
00772                            (40 * 1000 /
00773                             codec_param->setting.frm_per_pkt /
00774                             codec_param->info.frm_ptime)));
00775 
00776     if (stat.rx.update_cnt == 0)
00777         strcpy(last_update, "never");
00778     else {
00779         pj_gettimeofday(&now);
00780         PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, stat.rx.update);
00781         sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
00782                 now.sec / 3600,
00783                 (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
00784                 now.sec % 60,
00785                 now.msec);
00786     }
00787 
00788     printf(" RX stat last update: %s\n"
00789            "    total %s packets %sB received (%sB +IP hdr)%s\n"
00790            "    pkt loss=%d (%3.1f%%), dup=%d (%3.1f%%), reorder=%d (%3.1f%%)%s\n"
00791            "          (msec)    min     avg     max     last    dev\n"
00792            "    loss period: %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n"
00793            "    jitter     : %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n",
00794            last_update,
00795            good_number(packets, stat.rx.pkt),
00796            good_number(bytes, stat.rx.bytes),
00797            good_number(ipbytes, stat.rx.bytes + stat.rx.pkt * 32),
00798            "",
00799            stat.rx.loss,
00800            stat.rx.loss * 100.0 / (stat.rx.pkt + stat.rx.loss),
00801            stat.rx.dup, 
00802            stat.rx.dup * 100.0 / (stat.rx.pkt + stat.rx.loss),
00803            stat.rx.reorder, 
00804            stat.rx.reorder * 100.0 / (stat.rx.pkt + stat.rx.loss),
00805            "",
00806            stat.rx.loss_period.min / 1000.0, 
00807            stat.rx.loss_period.mean / 1000.0, 
00808            stat.rx.loss_period.max / 1000.0,
00809            stat.rx.loss_period.last / 1000.0,
00810            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&stat.rx.loss_period) / 1000.0,
00811            "",
00812            stat.rx.jitter.min / 1000.0,
00813            stat.rx.jitter.mean / 1000.0,
00814            stat.rx.jitter.max / 1000.0,
00815            stat.rx.jitter.last / 1000.0,
00816            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&stat.rx.jitter) / 1000.0,
00817            ""
00818            );
00819 
00820 
00821     if (stat.tx.update_cnt == 0)
00822         strcpy(last_update, "never");
00823     else {
00824         pj_gettimeofday(&now);
00825         PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, stat.tx.update);
00826         sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
00827                 now.sec / 3600,
00828                 (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
00829                 now.sec % 60,
00830                 now.msec);
00831     }
00832 
00833     printf(" TX stat last update: %s\n"
00834            "    total %s packets %sB sent (%sB +IP hdr)%s\n"
00835            "    pkt loss=%d (%3.1f%%), dup=%d (%3.1f%%), reorder=%d (%3.1f%%)%s\n"
00836            "          (msec)    min     avg     max     last    dev\n"
00837            "    loss period: %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n"
00838            "    jitter     : %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n",
00839            last_update,
00840            good_number(packets, stat.tx.pkt),
00841            good_number(bytes, stat.tx.bytes),
00842            good_number(ipbytes, stat.tx.bytes + stat.tx.pkt * 32),
00843            "",
00844            stat.tx.loss,
00845            stat.tx.loss * 100.0 / (stat.tx.pkt + stat.tx.loss),
00846            stat.tx.dup, 
00847            stat.tx.dup * 100.0 / (stat.tx.pkt + stat.tx.loss),
00848            stat.tx.reorder, 
00849            stat.tx.reorder * 100.0 / (stat.tx.pkt + stat.tx.loss),
00850            "",
00851            stat.tx.loss_period.min / 1000.0, 
00852            stat.tx.loss_period.mean / 1000.0, 
00853            stat.tx.loss_period.max / 1000.0,
00854            stat.tx.loss_period.last / 1000.0,
00855            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&stat.tx.loss_period) / 1000.0,
00856            "",
00857            stat.tx.jitter.min / 1000.0,
00858            stat.tx.jitter.mean / 1000.0,
00859            stat.tx.jitter.max / 1000.0,
00860            stat.tx.jitter.last / 1000.0,
00861            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&stat.tx.jitter) / 1000.0,
00862            ""
00863            );
00864 
00865 
00866     printf(" RTT delay     : %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n", 
00867            stat.rtt.min / 1000.0,
00868            stat.rtt.mean / 1000.0,
00869            stat.rtt.max / 1000.0,
00870            stat.rtt.last / 1000.0,
00871            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&stat.rtt) / 1000.0,
00872            ""
00873            );
00874 
00875 #if defined(PJMEDIA_HAS_RTCP_XR) && (PJMEDIA_HAS_RTCP_XR != 0)
00876     /* RTCP XR Reports */
00877     do {
00878         char loss[16], dup[16];
00879         char jitter[80];
00880         char toh[80];
00881         char plc[16], jba[16], jbr[16];
00882         char signal_lvl[16], noise_lvl[16], rerl[16];
00883         char r_factor[16], ext_r_factor[16], mos_lq[16], mos_cq[16];
00884         pjmedia_rtcp_xr_stat xr_stat;
00885 
00886         if (pjmedia_stream_get_stat_xr(stream, &xr_stat) != PJ_SUCCESS)
00887             break;
00888 
00889         puts("\nExtended reports:");
00890 
00891         /* Statistics Summary */
00892         puts(" Statistics Summary");
00893 
00894         if (xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.l)
00895             sprintf(loss, "%d", xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.lost);
00896         else
00897             sprintf(loss, "(na)");
00898 
00899         if (xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.d)
00900             sprintf(dup, "%d", xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.dup);
00901         else
00902             sprintf(dup, "(na)");
00903 
00904         if (xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.j) {
00905             unsigned jmin, jmax, jmean, jdev;
00906 
00907             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmin, xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.jitter.min, 
00908                             port->info.clock_rate);
00909             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmax, xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.jitter.max, 
00910                             port->info.clock_rate);
00911             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmean, xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.jitter.mean, 
00912                             port->info.clock_rate);
00913             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jdev, 
00914                            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.jitter),
00915                            port->info.clock_rate);
00916             sprintf(jitter, "%7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f", 
00917                     jmin/1000.0, jmean/1000.0, jmax/1000.0, jdev/1000.0);
00918         } else
00919             sprintf(jitter, "(report not available)");
00920 
00921         if (xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.t) {
00922             sprintf(toh, "%11d %11d %11d %11d", 
00923                     xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.toh.min,
00924                     xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.toh.mean,
00925                     xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.toh.max,
00926                     pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.toh));
00927         } else
00928             sprintf(toh, "(report not available)");
00929 
00930         if (xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.update.sec == 0)
00931             strcpy(last_update, "never");
00932         else {
00933             pj_gettimeofday(&now);
00934             PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.update);
00935             sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
00936                     now.sec / 3600,
00937                     (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
00938                     now.sec % 60,
00939                     now.msec);
00940         }
00941 
00942         printf(" RX last update: %s\n"
00943                "    begin seq=%d, end seq=%d%s\n"
00944                "    pkt loss=%s, dup=%s%s\n"
00945                "          (msec)    min     avg     max     dev\n"
00946                "    jitter     : %s\n"
00947                "    toh        : %s\n",
00948                last_update,
00949                xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.begin_seq, xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.end_seq,
00950                "",
00951                loss, dup,
00952                "",
00953                jitter,
00954                toh
00955                );
00956 
00957         if (xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.l)
00958             sprintf(loss, "%d", xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.lost);
00959         else
00960             sprintf(loss, "(na)");
00961 
00962         if (xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.d)
00963             sprintf(dup, "%d", xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.dup);
00964         else
00965             sprintf(dup, "(na)");
00966 
00967         if (xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.j) {
00968             unsigned jmin, jmax, jmean, jdev;
00969 
00970             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmin, xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.jitter.min, 
00971                             port->info.clock_rate);
00972             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmax, xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.jitter.max, 
00973                             port->info.clock_rate);
00974             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jmean, xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.jitter.mean, 
00975                             port->info.clock_rate);
00976             SAMPLES_TO_USEC(jdev, 
00977                            pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.jitter),
00978                            port->info.clock_rate);
00979             sprintf(jitter, "%7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f", 
00980                     jmin/1000.0, jmean/1000.0, jmax/1000.0, jdev/1000.0);
00981         } else
00982             sprintf(jitter, "(report not available)");
00983 
00984         if (xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.t) {
00985             sprintf(toh, "%11d %11d %11d %11d", 
00986                     xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.toh.min,
00987                     xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.toh.mean,
00988                     xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.toh.max,
00989                     pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&xr_stat.rx.stat_sum.toh));
00990         } else
00991             sprintf(toh,    "(report not available)");
00992 
00993         if (xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.update.sec == 0)
00994             strcpy(last_update, "never");
00995         else {
00996             pj_gettimeofday(&now);
00997             PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.update);
00998             sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
00999                     now.sec / 3600,
01000                     (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
01001                     now.sec % 60,
01002                     now.msec);
01003         }
01004 
01005         printf(" TX last update: %s\n"
01006                "    begin seq=%d, end seq=%d%s\n"
01007                "    pkt loss=%s, dup=%s%s\n"
01008                "          (msec)    min     avg     max     dev\n"
01009                "    jitter     : %s\n"
01010                "    toh        : %s\n",
01011                last_update,
01012                xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.begin_seq, xr_stat.tx.stat_sum.end_seq,
01013                "",
01014                loss, dup,
01015                "",
01016                jitter,
01017                toh
01018                );
01019 
01020         /* VoIP Metrics */
01021         puts(" VoIP Metrics");
01022 
01023         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(signal_lvl, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.signal_lvl);
01024         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(noise_lvl, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.noise_lvl);
01025         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(rerl, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.rerl);
01026         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(r_factor, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.r_factor);
01027         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(ext_r_factor, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.ext_r_factor);
01028         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(mos_lq, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.mos_lq);
01029         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(mos_cq, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.mos_cq);
01030 
01031         switch ((xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.rx_config>>6) & 3) {
01032             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_DIS:
01033                 sprintf(plc, "DISABLED");
01034                 break;
01035             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_ENH:
01036                 sprintf(plc, "ENHANCED");
01037                 break;
01038             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_STD:
01039                 sprintf(plc, "STANDARD");
01040                 break;
01041             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_UNK:
01042             default:
01043                 sprintf(plc, "UNKNOWN");
01044                 break;
01045         }
01046 
01047         switch ((xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.rx_config>>4) & 3) {
01048             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_JB_FIXED:
01049                 sprintf(jba, "FIXED");
01050                 break;
01051             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_JB_ADAPTIVE:
01052                 sprintf(jba, "ADAPTIVE");
01053                 break;
01054             default:
01055                 sprintf(jba, "UNKNOWN");
01056                 break;
01057         }
01058 
01059         sprintf(jbr, "%d", xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.rx_config & 0x0F);
01060 
01061         if (xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.update.sec == 0)
01062             strcpy(last_update, "never");
01063         else {
01064             pj_gettimeofday(&now);
01065             PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.update);
01066             sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
01067                     now.sec / 3600,
01068                     (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
01069                     now.sec % 60,
01070                     now.msec);
01071         }
01072 
01073         printf(" RX last update: %s\n"
01074                "    packets    : loss rate=%d (%.2f%%), discard rate=%d (%.2f%%)\n"
01075                "    burst      : density=%d (%.2f%%), duration=%d%s\n"
01076                "    gap        : density=%d (%.2f%%), duration=%d%s\n"
01077                "    delay      : round trip=%d%s, end system=%d%s\n"
01078                "    level      : signal=%s%s, noise=%s%s, RERL=%s%s\n"
01079                "    quality    : R factor=%s, ext R factor=%s\n"
01080                "                 MOS LQ=%s, MOS CQ=%s\n"
01081                "    config     : PLC=%s, JB=%s, JB rate=%s, Gmin=%d\n"
01082                "    JB delay   : cur=%d%s, max=%d%s, abs max=%d%s\n",
01083                last_update,
01084                /* pakcets */
01085                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.loss_rate, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.loss_rate*100.0/256,
01086                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.discard_rate, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.discard_rate*100.0/256,
01087                /* burst */
01088                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.burst_den, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.burst_den*100.0/256,
01089                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.burst_dur, "ms",
01090                /* gap */
01091                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.gap_den, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.gap_den*100.0/256,
01092                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.gap_dur, "ms",
01093                /* delay */
01094                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.rnd_trip_delay, "ms",
01095                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.end_sys_delay, "ms",
01096                /* level */
01097                signal_lvl, "dB",
01098                noise_lvl, "dB",
01099                rerl, "",
01100                /* quality */
01101                r_factor, ext_r_factor, mos_lq, mos_cq,
01102                /* config */
01103                plc, jba, jbr, xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.gmin,
01104                /* JB delay */
01105                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.jb_nom, "ms",
01106                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.jb_max, "ms",
01107                xr_stat.rx.voip_mtc.jb_abs_max, "ms"
01108                );
01109 
01110         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(signal_lvl, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.signal_lvl);
01111         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(noise_lvl, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.noise_lvl);
01112         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(rerl, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.rerl);
01113         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(r_factor, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.r_factor);
01114         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(ext_r_factor, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.ext_r_factor);
01115         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(mos_lq, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.mos_lq);
01116         PRINT_VOIP_MTC_VAL(mos_cq, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.mos_cq);
01117 
01118         switch ((xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.rx_config>>6) & 3) {
01119             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_DIS:
01120                 sprintf(plc, "DISABLED");
01121                 break;
01122             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_ENH:
01123                 sprintf(plc, "ENHANCED");
01124                 break;
01125             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_STD:
01126                 sprintf(plc, "STANDARD");
01127                 break;
01128             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_PLC_UNK:
01129             default:
01130                 sprintf(plc, "unknown");
01131                 break;
01132         }
01133 
01134         switch ((xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.rx_config>>4) & 3) {
01135             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_JB_FIXED:
01136                 sprintf(jba, "FIXED");
01137                 break;
01138             case PJMEDIA_RTCP_XR_JB_ADAPTIVE:
01139                 sprintf(jba, "ADAPTIVE");
01140                 break;
01141             default:
01142                 sprintf(jba, "unknown");
01143                 break;
01144         }
01145 
01146         sprintf(jbr, "%d", xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.rx_config & 0x0F);
01147 
01148         if (xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.update.sec == 0)
01149             strcpy(last_update, "never");
01150         else {
01151             pj_gettimeofday(&now);
01152             PJ_TIME_VAL_SUB(now, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.update);
01153             sprintf(last_update, "%02ldh:%02ldm:%02ld.%03lds ago",
01154                     now.sec / 3600,
01155                     (now.sec % 3600) / 60,
01156                     now.sec % 60,
01157                     now.msec);
01158         }
01159 
01160         printf(" TX last update: %s\n"
01161                "    packets    : loss rate=%d (%.2f%%), discard rate=%d (%.2f%%)\n"
01162                "    burst      : density=%d (%.2f%%), duration=%d%s\n"
01163                "    gap        : density=%d (%.2f%%), duration=%d%s\n"
01164                "    delay      : round trip=%d%s, end system=%d%s\n"
01165                "    level      : signal=%s%s, noise=%s%s, RERL=%s%s\n"
01166                "    quality    : R factor=%s, ext R factor=%s\n"
01167                "                 MOS LQ=%s, MOS CQ=%s\n"
01168                "    config     : PLC=%s, JB=%s, JB rate=%s, Gmin=%d\n"
01169                "    JB delay   : cur=%d%s, max=%d%s, abs max=%d%s\n",
01170                last_update,
01171                /* pakcets */
01172                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.loss_rate, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.loss_rate*100.0/256,
01173                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.discard_rate, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.discard_rate*100.0/256,
01174                /* burst */
01175                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.burst_den, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.burst_den*100.0/256,
01176                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.burst_dur, "ms",
01177                /* gap */
01178                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.gap_den, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.gap_den*100.0/256,
01179                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.gap_dur, "ms",
01180                /* delay */
01181                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.rnd_trip_delay, "ms",
01182                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.end_sys_delay, "ms",
01183                /* level */
01184                signal_lvl, "dB",
01185                noise_lvl, "dB",
01186                rerl, "",
01187                /* quality */
01188                r_factor, ext_r_factor, mos_lq, mos_cq,
01189                /* config */
01190                plc, jba, jbr, xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.gmin,
01191                /* JB delay */
01192                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.jb_nom, "ms",
01193                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.jb_max, "ms",
01194                xr_stat.tx.voip_mtc.jb_abs_max, "ms"
01195                );
01196 
01197 
01198         /* RTT delay (by receiver side) */
01199         printf("          (msec)    min     avg     max     last    dev\n");
01200         printf(" RTT delay     : %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f%s\n", 
01201                xr_stat.rtt.min / 1000.0,
01202                xr_stat.rtt.mean / 1000.0,
01203                xr_stat.rtt.max / 1000.0,
01204                xr_stat.rtt.last / 1000.0,
01205                pj_math_stat_get_stddev(&xr_stat.rtt) / 1000.0,
01206                ""
01207                );
01208     } while (0);
01209 #endif /* PJMEDIA_HAS_RTCP_XR */
01210 
01211 }
01212
